column5: anyone else having trouble getting on OFC  or is it just me  it's been slow on and off lately but this morning it took over 15 mins to get on all other sites I tried were as fast as normal  for some reason internet explorer was faster then firefox
and now it's getting faster.....I don't know
I hear ya Terry. For the last two weeks or so it's been slowing down for me between 5:30am and 6:10 or so. Haven't figured it out yet but we do have a lead. Something about marshmallows.....
Roy, you gotta switch back tosmall white marshmallows. give the small colored ones a break for awhile, they are getting tired. thats why its slowing down.
